name: Katalyst
description:
Shoot your way through a frenzy of enemies while dodging bullets and use various weapons to your advantage!

Endure through 5 increasingly difficult levels all while defeating a variety of enemies, and bosses along the way!(Only 1 level available in the demo)

Variety of tactics at your disposal!


3 Different weapons!
-Cannon
-Spreadshot
-Lazer(Not in the demo currently)

Use the Power-up bar to gain advantages!
-Increase your speed
-Increase your fire rate!
-Get shields!

What separates this game from the others like it?
-You can shoot the enemy bullets! Yes this is true if the bullets are purple, but if its red then you might as well run home to mommy right now!

Do you have what it takes to save the world?
